item.title: Solar Power in Central Europe
item.description:
Solar potential

My house has excellent solar potential. Itâ€™s roughly on 47 degrees north. One entire side of the roof has an azimuth of about 220 degrees and a declination of 31 degrees. The total usable surface for the panels is 62 square meters.

The roof is big enough for 36 panels. 24 at a declination of 31 degrees and 12 at 10 degrees. With 330 wP panels this sums up to 11.8 kWp. The local utility company that installed the system projects a yearly production of 12.2 MWh.
